content: I have added a new file compiler/rustc_mir_transform/src/dse.rs and x.py fmt is not running on it. I have committed it in git. Any idea why it's not running?
When you say "not running", do you mean it says "skipping untracked file"? Or that you have a change you know has bad formatting that isn't being fixed?
It's not listed as a skipped file, and it has bad formatting that isn't being fixed
Hmm yeah that is strange, I'm not sure. Maybe add -vv and see if it prints the files it's formatting
It doesn't :frown:
